author: What's Trending Staff
title: Artificial Intelligence: Let’s Redefine the Future with its Transformative Power!
text: No doubt, Artificial Intelligence (AI) is an emerging and a potentially impactful technology, in recent years. AI has made its way to almost all industries today, from self driving cars to voice activated personal assistants, it is revolutionizing your lives, work, and how we interface with things around us. AI advancements urge you to understand its benefits, implications, challenges, and future potential to collaborate with it. In this article, you will get to know the foundation of AI, how it works, and how it is changing the future of business and modern life. What is AI (Artificial Intelligence)? Artificial Intelligence refers to the process or set of processes used to enable machines, computers, and software to learn, make decisions, and solve problems. Indeed, AI systems are different from traditional software, following set rules, getting better over time, and learning from data yet not coded. Apart from this; NLP (natural language processing), ML (machine learning), and neural networks are some of the important sub technologies that fall under the large umbrella or industry of artificial intelligence which enables a machine to comprehend and answer to different commands. Artificial intelligence is transforming various industries by enabling experts to identify patterns, optimize processes, and create more effective strategies. For example, AI algorithms can detect anomalies in data, predict outcomes, and facilitate innovative solutions. Now, organizations have enhanced their management systems [with the use of gf AI](http://herahaven.ai/) to provide better experiences and increased operational efficiency. How Artificial Intelligence Transform Various Industries - Finance AI in finance has helped in making the processes of the financial sector more easier for instance in areas of fraud detection, risk management, and customer relations. Today it became very easy for machine learning algorithms to analyze huge data for fraudulent activity and other patterns. In addition, organizations are deploying AI chatbots for fast client service, immediate question answering, and executing transactions. - Retail AI has revolutionized the retail sphere since it provides tailored approaches to consumers and optimizes their supply chain processes. Recommendation systems based on artificial intelligence provide recommendations for products according to the users’ history of navigation and purchases, helping retailers to sell more. AI is also beneficial in customer sentiment analysis, inventory management, and demand forecasting. - Manufacturing Robotics & automation manufacturing with the power of artificial intelligence has done a turn-around. If you possess your robots with the AI, there is no need to think about precision as the percent of error is likely going to decrease. Another of the many wonderful things which can be credited to AI is predictive maintenance where manufacturers are able to analyze equipment, detect wear and tear, perform necessary maintenance before they occur. about high precision, because the margin for error will be reduced. It reduces downtime and increases productivity. - Transportation Artificial intelligence has transformed transportation via intelligent traffic management systems. The technology, which is making its debut in China’s coastal cities, uses AI to guide autonomous vehicles, avoid obstacles, navigate through traffic, and ensure the safety of passengers. It also optimizes the traffic flow, reduces congestion, and reduces fuel consumption, making urban transportation more sustainable. ADVERTISEMENT Notable Advantages of Artificial Intelligence The notable advantages of AI are: - Data Analysis: AI can analyze vast amounts of data and draw actionable insights. This can enable companies to use this capability to enhance decision making, optimize marketing campaigns, and improve customer experiences. - Automation & Efficiency: AI handles mundane and repetitive tasks more efficiently, allowing you to focus on strategic activities and freeing up human resources. It leads to increased productivity and cost savings. - Personalization: AI allows companies to provide customers with customized products and services, depending on their personal needs. This is extremely useful in various industries such as e-commerce, entertainment, and advertising; as in these sectors customer satisfaction & engagement is necessary. - 24/7 Availability: Humans have to rest, take breaks, sleep, and go on vacation, but AI systems have no such prerequisite. That is to say that now businesses can offer services all time, enhancing efficiency, outcomes, and customer satisfaction. What is Lying Ahead: The Future of AI Thus, the future of AI is beyond measure and quite promising, there are countless opportunities to appear in the future vision. Due to deep learning, neural networks, and machine learning, AI systems are getting faster and smarter with great efficiency. There are further opportunities for AI to be implemented in different sectors including smart city, health, transport, and others including the creative sectors like writing, music, art works, etc. Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) which equips machines to carry out any cognitive activity that a man can is under development now. As for AGI, we are still in the infancy but the development of narrow AI systems has revealed how far we have come. One of the major trends is democratization of AI. earlier AI solutions were available only to larger organizations.However, with the help of gf AI, all types of businesses can employ various AI technologies. It will help drive more adoption and development in the AI ecosystem. The Verdict AI is not anymore some abstract concept of the future; it is here now and transforming the way you are living. While it has changed societies and businesses, you must use it appropriately to avoid ethical and privacy issues. In the future, the question will be how to maintain an equal ratio between invention and entrusting that AI would be to the advantage of all. The future of AI is accessible and bright, making changes that are revolutionary for the entire world. ADVERTISEMENT

author: Pilar Galán Rodríguez
title: Apagón y pocas luces
text:
Opinión | Jueves sociales
Hágase la luz
Se nos fue la luz y se nos apagaron las pocas luces que teníamos. Lo primero fue acordarse del kit de salvamento que hace nada nos recomendaban y, lo segundo, maldecir no haber hecho caso a los agoreros. Mucho antes de que los transistores (esa palabra tan antigua) empezaran a emitir las razones del apagón, en las tiendas la teoría de la conspiración ganaba adeptos a cada segundo. Si nos quedamos a oscuras a las doce, a y cinco ya se sabía que había sido un ataque terrorista o un intento de doblegarnos de alguna potencia fuera quien fuera, por ejemplo, extraterrestre. Los supermercados, de nuevo, volvieron a agotar existencias, esta vez de carbón, pilas y linternas, y las gasolineras colapsaron quizá por si teníamos que emprender la huida.
Daba miedo, pero dábamos más miedo nosotros. Nuestra fragilidad. Nuestro desamparo. Con una rayita de batería imaginábamos escenarios apocalípticos en que volviéramos a comunicarnos con señales de humo
Daba miedo, es cierto. Yo nunca había conocido un apagón nacional y eso que venía entrenada desde la infancia cuando las tormentas nos dejaban a oscuras y jugábamos a tinieblas por toda la casa. Daba miedo, pero dábamos más miedo nosotros. Nuestra fragilidad. Nuestro desamparo. Con una rayita de batería imaginábamos escenarios apocalípticos en que volviéramos a comunicarnos con señales de humo. Sin cajeros automáticos no éramos nadie, a ver qué íbamos a hacer sin dinero, salvo refugiarnos de nuevo en el trueque. Las grandes ciudades se llenaron de paseantes desorientados sin metro, autobús o patinetes eléctricos, esa plaga. Las personas salían de las bocas de metro como zombis a los que el sol pudiera destruir en un momento. Había quien se quejaba de no poder volver a casa hasta dos o tres horas más tarde en ciudades hechas a medida de los coches y no del hombre. Dejaron de funcionar los semáforos y como habíamos olvidado las prioridades y el libro de la autoescuela, los accidentes crecieron como setas.
Parecía que íbamos a volver a las cavernas, pero no. Yo todo lo tengo eléctrico, se quejaba una señora, como si los demás cocináramos sobre las brasas. No pasó nada por comer de bocadillos o de latas o saborear una pieza de fruta. Salimos a la calle, cansados de brujulear sin éxito en busca de internet o de uno de los miles de canales de televisión ahora no disponibles. Hubo quien hasta abrió ese libro olvidado. Y eso que no cerraron los grandes centros comerciales, ni hubo hambruna, y los hospitales funcionaron. Poco a poco volvimos a la normalidad, unos más tarde que otros. No fue necesario encender el fuego ni contar historias alrededor de la hoguera. No tuvimos que cazar ni pescar ni buscar refugio. Como mucho, subir cinco pisos a pie. Hablar entre nosotros. Encender velas. Vino la luz y nos encontró tan a oscuras como nos había dejado. A lo mejor es que no tenemos remedio.

author: Società Editrice Athesis S.p.A.
title: La piastrina di “Lalo” torna a casa dopo 81 anni | G. di Vicenza
text: Dopo 81 anni, la piastrina militare di “Lalo” è tornata a casa. “Lalo” era Alfonso Migliorini, alpino maladense della divisione Julia, reduce dal fronte greco-albanese, che nei concitati momenti successivi all’8 settembre 1943, mentre cercava fortunosamente di rientrare a Malo, la smarrì. Migliorini è mancato a 80 anni nel 1999, e mai avrebbe pensato che la sua piastrina, dopo altri 25 anni, sarebbe stata rinvenuta e avrebbe ritrovato la strada di casa. La piastrina di “Lalo” Migliorini, alpino maladense della divisione Julia, è tornata ai figli Una storia incredibile, quella che si è conclusa nei giorni scorsi nella sede del gruppo alpini di Malo, con la commovente consegna della piastrina ai figli di Alfonso “Lalo” Migliorini, che vivono ancora in paese. Per raccontarla serve fare un passo indietro alla fine di agosto, quando Fausto Zanatta e Lino Bernardi, ricercatori storici dell’associazione “Battaglia del solstizio” di Nervesa della Battaglia, erano impegnati usando il metal detector in un’attività di ricerca di reperti lungo la Tradotta, vecchia linea ferroviaria tra Montebelluna e Ponte alla Priula, teatro di importanti scontri tra italiani e austroungarici nel giugno del 1918. Tutto avrebbero pensato i due appassionati tranne che di imbattersi in un cimelio del secondo conflitto mondiale invece che, come era lecito attendersi in quella zona, della Grande Guerra. Una volta ripulita e tornata leggibile, la piastrina in rame ha svelato il nome del militare che la portava al collo: Migliorini Alfonso, di Alfonso e Pampanelli Teresa, classe 1919, Malo, Vicenza. La storia di Alfonso Migliorini reduce dal fronte greco-albanese Bernardi e Zanatta hanno così avviato le ricerche, dalle quali è emerso che l’alpino Migliorini apparteneva alla divisione Julia, era stato inviato in Albania e aveva combattuto sul fronte greco-albanese riportando anche un inizio di congelamento per il quale era stato ricoverato a Valona e quindi rimpatriato. Terminata la convalescenza a casa, era stato inviato sul fronte orientale a combattere contro i partigiani comunisti di Tito, evitando così la campagna di Russia, dove la Julia sarebbe stata decimata. Prestò poi servizio sul fronte occidentale, in Val d’Aosta, per tornare infine su quello orientale, dove l’armistizio lo sorprese nella zona di Caporetto. Catturato e imprigionato a Cividale, riuscì però a fuggire e a dirigersi verso ovest, verso Malo. Fu attraversando la vecchia linea ferroviaria nel Trevigiano che smarrì la piastrina, rimasta sepolta sotto pochi centimetri di terra fino a poche settimane fa. Bernardi e Zanatta hanno quindi coinvolto il Comune di Malo e il gruppo Ana, con i quali hanno organizzato la consegna. Ottantuno anni dopo l'incontro nella sede degli Alpini con i familiari e i ricercatori Toccante è stato l’incontro avvenuto nei giorni scorsi nella sede del gruppo alpini di Malo tra i ricercatori trevigiani e i familiari dell’alpino Migliorini, ancor più perché avvenuto, in modo del tutto casuale, proprio il giorno in cui ricorreva il compleanno del reduce. Presenti il sindaco Moreno Marsetti, l’arciprete don Giampaolo Barausse e il capogruppo Gianni Stevan; davanti a una folta schiera di alpini Bernardi e Zanatta hanno ripercorso emozionati le fasi del ritrovamento e quindi hanno consegnato il cimelio, che avevano provveduto a incorniciare, ai tre figli di “Lalo”, Nadia, Rosanna e Luciano, visibilmente commossi, per l’inatteso regalo che rappresenta una parte importante della storia di famiglia. «La attaccheremo al muro accanto alla croce al merito di guerra di cui nostro padre era stato insignito», hanno detto ringraziando con le lacrime agli occhi.

author: Research and Markets
title: Fast Fashion Global Strategic Business Report 2024: Market to Reach $184.7 Billion by 2030 - Sustainability Concerns Generate Shifts Towards Eco-Friendly Fast Fashion Options
text: Dublin, July 05, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Fast Fashion - Global Strategic Business Report" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering. The global market for Fast Fashion was valued at an estimated US$111.4 Billion in 2023 and is projected to reach US$184.7 Billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 7.5% from 2023 to 2030. This comprehensive report provides an in-depth analysis of market trends, drivers, and forecasts, helping you make informed business decisions. Sustainability concerns are increasingly coming to the forefront of consumer consciousness, influencing a shift within the fast fashion industry. Awareness about the environmental and ethical implications of fast fashion - such as waste, pollution, and labor conditions - has led to growing pressure for change. In response, some fast fashion brands are beginning to integrate more sustainable practices, such as using recycled materials and reducing waste in their supply chains. Another significant trend is the digitalization of fashion retail. The use of artificial intelligence for inventory management, virtual fitting rooms, and personalized marketing strategies are reshaping the shopping experience, making it more efficient and tailored to individual preferences. Despite the growing awareness and appreciation for the benefits of circular fashion, fast fashion`s deep-rooted presence in consumer culture, especially among young demographics, makes it challenging to phase out. The speed with which fast fashion aligns with ever-changing trends makes it particularly appealing to the youth demographic, underscoring a societal inclination towards immediate gratification and trend participation. Key Insights: - Market Growth: Understand the significant growth trajectory of the Female Gender segment, which is expected to reach US$112.5 Billion by 2030 with a CAGR of a 7.1%. The Male Gender segment is also set to grow at 8.0% CAGR over the analysis period. - Regional Analysis: Gain insights into the U.S. market, estimated at $30.4 Billion in 2023, and China, forecasted to grow at an impressive 11.8% CAGR to reach $40.9 Billion by 2030. Discover growth trends in other key regions, including Japan, Canada, Germany, and the Asia-Pacific. Why You Should Buy This Report: - Detailed Market Analysis: Access a thorough analysis of the Global Fast Fashion Market, covering all major geographic regions and market segments. - Competitive Insights: Get an overview of the competitive landscape, including the market presence of major players across different geographies. - Future Trends and Drivers: Understand the key trends and drivers shaping the future of the Global Fast Fashion Market. - Actionable Insights: Benefit from actionable insights that can help you identify new revenue opportunities and make strategic business decisions. Key Questions Answered: - How is the Global Fast Fashion Market expected to evolve by 2030? - What are the main drivers and restraints affecting the market? - Which market segments will grow the most over the forecast period? - How will market shares for different regions and segments change by 2030? - Who are the leading players in the market, and what are their prospects? Report Features: - Comprehensive Market Data: Independent analysis of annual sales and market forecasts in US$ Million from 2023 to 2030. - In-Depth Regional Analysis: Detailed insights into key markets, including the U.S., China, Japan, Canada, Europe, Asia-Pacific, Latin America, Middle East, and Africa. - Company Profiles: Coverage of major players such as Authentic Brands Group LLC, Boohoo.com UK Limited, C&A Mode GmbH & Co. KG, and more. - Complimentary Updates: Receive free report updates for one year to keep you informed of the latest market developments. author: Victor MIGET
title: Fuite de données chez Direct Assurance : des IBAN et des RIB dans la nature - L'INFORMATICIEN & L'INFO CYBER-RISQUES - L'1FO Tech par L'Informaticien - L'INFORMATICIEN - L'1FO Tech par L'Informaticien
text:
Des pirates auraient exploité des accès internes pour pénétrer les systèmes de Direct Assurance et exfiltrer des données sensibles, parmi lesquelles figurent des RIB et des IBAN.
Dans le sillage de l’attaque visant un établissement de santé, qui a compromis les données de 750 000 patients, le collectif de pirates near2tlg revendique également une intrusion chez Direct Assurance, filiale d’Axa. Au total, 15 000 clients et prospects français sont concernés. Et ce n’est pas tout : les données volées comprennent des IBAN pour 5800 clients concernés, mais aussi des RIB, noms, adresses e-mail et numéros de téléphone.
Dans un message publié sur BreachForums, near2tlg annonce : « Aujourd’hui, je vends les données des clients/prospects de Direct Assurance. Direct Assurance a été compromis le 14 novembre par @near2tlg avec un accès employé. » Selon le groupe, 6 137 clients et 9 517 prospects sont concernés. Les données ont été mises en vente avec une limite de trois acheteurs maximum, et un slot aurait déjà été réservé, selon le site Zataz.
Un groupe prolifique
Cette fuite suscite des craintes quant à de potentielles tentatives de phishing, de vols d’identité, mais aussi de fraudes bancaires, notamment par l’autorisation de prélèvements frauduleux à l’aide des IBAN et des RIB volés.
Le collectif near2tlg est bien connu pour ses activités intensives cette année. Il a notamment revendiqué une attaque contre des établissements de santé, entraînant l’exfiltration des données de 1,5 million de patients. Parmi ses autres cibles figurent également le Journal Le Point, avec une fuite concernant plus de 900 000 utilisateurs, et l’opérateur SFR.

author: nchacon
title: Un chico de 14 años murió por inyectarse una mariposa muerta
text:
Un chico de 14 años de edad murió después de sufrir un shock séptico por inyectarse el líquido de una mariposa muerta.
Davi Nunes Moreira fue trasladado de urgencia al hospital de Planalto, en el estado de Bahía, Brasil, luego de vomitar y presentar problemas para caminar.
Según los medios locales, el joven habría mezclado una mariposa muerta con agua y se inyectó este líquido en la pierna derecha.
La policía investiga el caso y se centra en la posibilidad de que este extraño acto hiciera parte de un reto viral de redes sociales.
La muerte está vinculada a posibles toxinas en la mezcla para mariposas que podrían haber provocado que el cuerpo del chico dejara de funcionar.
Ver más: Falleció la actriz surcoreana Kim Sae-ron a los 24 años de edad El profesor Marcelo Duarte, director del Museo de Zoología de la Universidad de Sao Paulo y especialista en mariposas, explicó: «Las mariposas tienen una biología compleja y los fluidos presentes en sus cuerpos no han sido estudiados en profundidad en términos de su toxicidad para los humanos «.
Reacciones a los venenos Los expertos advierten sobre los peligros de manipular fluidos biológicos de insectos, ya que muchas especies contienen toxinas que pueden ser perjudiciales para los humanos.
Por ejemplo, el algodoncillo que las mariposas monarca consumen mientras que son orugas es en realidad una toxina venenosa que almacenan en sus cuerpos.
Te puede interesar: Pez diablo negro: ¿por qué murió y cuál es su tamaño real? El peligro de los retos virales Muchos retos que se han vuelto virales en redes sociales implican actividades peligrosas, como desafíos extremos que pueden resultar en lesiones graves o incluso la muerte.
Sobre este tema existe una presión social que impulsa a los jóvenes a participar en diferentes actividades para ser aceptados y que pueden generar un impacto psicológico.
Según la fundación e-tic , un estudio señaló que el 21% de los jóvenes de entre 13 y 19 años ha participado en algún reto en línea y un 2% ha estado involucrado en retos que se consideran peligrosos.
Healthy Children señala que las redes sociales premian el comportamiento escandaloso, y entre más escandaloso, más se puede alardear. «El ámbito de las redes sociales es trepidante e irreflexivo, y el miedo a perder es real para los adolescentes. Este ámbito posibilita la incapacidad de los adolescentes de pensar en las consecuencias de sus acciones».
También Current Psychology dice que «los adolescentes sienten la necesidad de demostrar que son capaces de realizar y superar estos desafíos . Esta motivación les genera una sensación de adrenalina y satisfacción personal por haber completado el reto, a la vez que consolidan su identidad digital al difundir el vídeo en las redes sociales».
Ver más:
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->drug related crimes

author: Sarah Fields
title: Minecraft Fans Want Changes Made to New Snapshot Feature
text:
Minecraft Fans Want Changes Made to New Snapshot Feature Minecraft By Sarah Fields Published 1 hour ago Follow Followed Like Thread Link copied to clipboard Minecraft Related
Minecraft May Be Teasing a Major New Feature
Stardew Valley Fan Builds Player's Farm in Minecraft 2:54
Despite The Negative Reception, Minecraft's Movie Has an Advantage Many Game Adaptations Don't Sign in to your Game Rant account
Summary Fans are unhappy with the new leaf litter block texture in Minecraft's latest snapshot. Developers may take fan feedback into consideration to improve the feature. Players suggest adding more randomness and layering textures to enhance the visual appeal. Minecraft has launched a snapshot with new features, but fans are dissatisfied with the leaf litter addition. Minecraft players seem to like the idea of it, but have been discussing problems with how the new feature has been implemented, and how it could be improved.
Minecraft has shifted to releasing more frequent updates on a smaller scale, but is still releasing snapshots that contain developmental versions of new features. This allows the developers an opportunity to find potential bugs and issues, and also gauge how potential additions are received by the community. Some fans are hopeful that their concerns are being heard regarding this new feature.
Related Minecraft May Be Teasing a Major New Feature Minecraft developer Mojang Studios potentially teases a major new feature that could be coming to the massively popular sandbox game in the future.
Posts On January 8, Minecraft released snapshot 25w02a , and added a new leaf litter block that's intended to make it look like fallen leaves from surrounding foliage has fallen on the ground, as one would expect in real life. However, fans like Resin_Brick aren't too happy with the feature, claiming that it doesn't look as good as it should. Resin_Brick says that they don't like the texture because it isn't visually random enough, and others agreed, with some hoping that more variation is added with the final release.
Minecraft May Listen to Snapshot Concerns Fans have been hopeful that their concerns are being heard since the leaf litter was added in a snapshot . Minecraft developers have been receptive to feedback in the past, and this iteration of the leaf litter may not be completely finalized to begin with. The fans have made a lot of suggestions as to how this feature could look better, which the developers could potentially take inspiration from. For example, some have pointed out how brown leaves look a bit odd when there's nothing but vibrant green on the trees themselves, while others think that small piles of leaves instead of a flat texture would look better. One plausible solution suggested by a player is to simply layer the textures on top of each other randomly, so that it appears less sparse. This may also help to make it look less like a repeating texture, as layering could create many more variations.
Close While the new leaf litter has no real impact on overall gameplay, the aesthetics of Minecraft can have a big impact for some players. Those who dedicate tons of time carefully crafting how parts of their Minecraft world look may not be thrilled if the leaf litter is added in its current state when a full update arrives for the game. With some luck, the devs will take this feedback into consideration and find a solution that improves upon its current state without entirely scrapping the Minecraft feature .

Minecraft Minecraft is a game made up of blocks, creatures, and community. You can survive the night or build a work of art – the choice is all yours. But if the thought of exploring a vast new world all on your own feels overwhelming, then fear not!
Minecraft has no set goal and can be played however you’d like! This is why it’s sometimes called a “sandbox game” – there are lots of things for you to do, and lots of ways that you can play. If you like being creative, then you can use the blocks to build things from your imagination. If you’re feeling brave, you can explore the world and face daring challenges. Blocks can be broken, crafted, placed to reshape the landscape, or used to build fantastical creations.
Creatures can be battled or befriended, depending on how you play. The world of Minecraft allows for epic adventures, quiet meditations, and everything in between. You can even share your creations with other players, or play in community worlds!
Sandbox Survival Systems
